articleContent:
During the event, 5-Star Resonator: Roccia, 4-Star Resonators: Danjin, Youhu, and Yuanwu receive boosted drop rates!
 
✦Duration✦
2025-01-23 10:00 - 2025-02-12 11:59 (server time)
 
✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 8 or complete the combat trial in "First Resonance" and activate the Convene function.
 
✦Convene Rules✦
- [Stage in the Box] is a Featured Resonator Convene event. Use Radiant Tide to convene. You are guaranteed at least one 4-Star or higher rarity Resonator or weapon every 10 attempts.
- The guarantee count is shared among all Featured Resonator Convene events and is carried over until a 5-Star Resonator is obtained.
- Featured Resonator Roccia is exclusive to the [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene and will not be available by other means once the event ends.
- Featured Resonator Roccia's Waveband will be simultaneously made available in the Afterglow Coral Store with a limit of 2 purchases, and it will be removed once the Convene event ends.
- During the Convene, all Featured Resonators will be available in [Ascendant Aces] trial event. Complete the trial challenge with the Resonators to receive rewards.
 
※For more details, please refer to the Convene screen in-game.
articleTitle: [Stage in the Box] Featured Resonator Convene: Boosted Drop Rate for Roccia
